candidates.why: Closest orchestrator: multi-phase loop, explicit orchestrator boundary, agent roles, session artifacts, parallel planning via @cli-planning-agent, conservative verification.
Review-cycle family with parallel sub-agents + aggregation and structured TodoWrite progress tracking (similar to Phase 1.5+2+3 coordination).
General workflow orchestrator with resume, execution models (parallel/serial/phased), TodoWrite coordination, and error recovery patterns.
Produces fix-related artifacts and integrates with testing/fix workflows; useful for artifact naming and conservative verification conventions.
Adjacent command chain; references /workflow:review-cycle-fix as the automated fixing step after review findings export.

selected.reason: Max overlap in execution model (parallel planning + stage-based execution), artifacts (session folder + per-unit outputs), and agent/tool surface.
